title: [Large-Scale] Teaching Presence Enhancement Strategies in Hybrid Environments: Writing Education for Science Field Leaders

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in online learning environments and possession of basic writing skills
context.additional_context: Hybrid writing course for science field managers/leaders in corporate settings, conducted in mobile-based microlearning environments with continuous feedback through formative assessments

learning_goals: Learners can explain the three elements of the Community of Inquiry (CoI) framework (Teaching Presence, Social Presence, Cognitive Presence).
Learners can design over two instructional strategies providing personalized feedback in mobile environments.
Learners can propose methods for utilizing digital tools to facilitate group discussions in online/hybrid settings.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
